Text.Page: You here to help?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Sure. What can I do for you?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Can you lend a hand to {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia}? She's trying to track down some crafting materials we desperately need.

So, {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} sent someone to help me, eh? About time!

For days we've been telling customers to look elsewhere for items we should have in stock.

Can you help me get what I need?

Thanks. Now I can fill all those backorders.

Thank {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} for sending you my way. Then pants her and kick her in the shins. Joking!
I need verdra fiber. You know what that is, right?

Whoohoo! Stuff!

Tell {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} this is a huge help.

Thanks, !

Do you have the goods?

The dawnhide? I don't see it...

Seriously? Why in Velik's name are you still here?

Do you know how popular dawnhide is?

, you're entirely too helpful. Come back and be "too helpful" any time!

Seriously, we're lucky to have you around.
